services.design_text: In the modern digital world, creating a website is the first interaction of consumers with your business, so almost 95% of the first user impression is related to website designs.
services.site_text: A website is a unique address. Website or web-site in English: web - means spider web, network and site - place, segment, part of a network. A site is a collection of linked web pages that use the same domain name. Websites can be created by an individual, group, business or organization for a variety of purposes. All public websites are part of the World Wide Web.
services.marketing_text: The goal of marketing is to attract new customers for a product, product, or service, offering them high consumer quality, while satisfying their ever-changing needs while retaining existing customers.

signin.tiklash_text: Enter the address associated with your account, we will send you instructions on how to change the password. They fall into your telegram address so check.
